author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Convert DDHCalForwardAlgo to dd4Hep format and successfully test algorithms of DDHCalAngular and DDHCalForwardAlgo in the context of dd4Hep vs DDD

#### PR validation:

Since dd4Hep scenarios are still under development, the codes are tested with configuration files in test/python directory 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx218 Transfer one more DDAlgorithm of HCAL for dd4Hep
